Flow.description: SFS-1316 v12 - Removed recordtype assignment v15 - Updated as fix of SFS-2819 v19 - removing service report references and updated as a fix of SFS-2819 V22 - Prevent two records from being created SFS-3975 v26 - Populating service report template Id on WO for offline testing as part of SFS-3930 v29 - Populating service report template Id on WO using custom metadata for offline testing as part of SFS-3930 v30- SFS-4491. Consolidated Changes 4.2-25 Data Capture Form: Risk Assessment-Site Specific - Water Infra v37-Updated as a part of SFS-5314 Updated as part of SFS-6910 Updated as part of SFS-6565 Updated as part of SFS-6196 Updated as part of SFS-6086 Updated as part of SFS-7860 Modified for US SFS-7860.

fields.name: displayExcavation

fields.name: devServHT
fields.fieldText: UNDERGROUND SERVICES - Genny to be used with CAT at all times. Horizontal digging techniques to be used. All services exposed prior to use of power tools. Genny & CAT to be tested on a known live service before every shift.

fields.name: displaytextonly
fields.fieldText:
Ensure all elements of the construction phase plan are in place e.g. job pack (inc. start/finish times), welfare facilities, access to SOPs & SSOW and this form. If within 10m from an overhead line escalate to your line manager as controls/method statement will be required

(If the answer is No you must complete the comments and escalate to your manager)
